DELETE_FLG = #{deleteFlg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STAGES = #{stages,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT L.ID, L.TITLE, L.APARTMENT_LAYOUT, L.RELEASE_STATUS, L.AUDIT_STATUS, (SELECT COUNT(1) COUNT FROM HOU_LEASE_ROOM_INFO R WHERE R.LEASEID = L.ID AND R.`STATUS` = 0 AND R.DELETE_FLG = 0) ROOM_COUNT FROM HOU_LEASE_INFO L WHERE HID = #{hid} AND DELETE_FLG = 0 LIMIT 0,1

SELECT CONCAT((SELECT AREA FROM SYS_AREA_AREAS WHERE AREA_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{district},',', 1)) ,' ', (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_TRADE_AREAS S WHERE S.TRADE_ID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{district},',', -1) )) DISTRICT_DIST_NAME FROM DUAL
mapper.update:
update hou_lease_info
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PINDEX = #{record.pindex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LNO = #{record.lno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDIT_STATUS = #{record.auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REJECT_TYPE = #{record.rejectType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REJECT_REASON = #{record.rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELEASE_STATUS = #{record.releaseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TO_SPECIAL = #{record.toSpecial,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SHELF_TYPE = #{record.shelfType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SHELF_REASON = #{record.shelfReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HID = #{record.hid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOUSE_TYPE = #{record.houseType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATIONID = #{record.stationid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHECKIN_TIME = #{record.checkinTime,jdbcType=DATE},
RENT_TYPE = #{record.rentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEASE_MODE = #{record.leaseMode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RENT = #{record.rent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VILLAGE_NAME = #{record.villageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT = #{record.district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT_NAME = #{record.districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NO = #{record.no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLOOR = #{record.floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUILD_TIME = #{record.buildTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APARTMENT_LAYOUT = #{record.apartmentLayout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIENTATION = #{record.orientation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DECOR = #{record.decor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DECOR_TIME = #{record.decorTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACILITIES = #{record.facilities,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELECTRIC = #{record.electric,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEATURE = #{record.feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENVIRONMENT = #{record.environment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUIREMENT = #{record.requirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{record.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT = #{record.contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRESH_TIME = #{record.freshTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_IDENTITY = #{record.createUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY = #{record.modifyUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_USER = #{record.modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_FLG = #{record.deleteFlg,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
LOCK_USERID = #{record.lockUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCK_TIME = #{record.lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RELEASE_TIME = #{record.releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SOURCE_TYPE = #{record.sourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OWNER_COST_ITEMS = #{record.ownerCostItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_COST = #{record.ownerCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
